About-Component.home-about-description: OMG Capital Advisors (OMG or OMG Capital) is an Istanbul-based consultancy firm specializing in non-bank financing solutions. Established in 2020, the company focuses on asset-backed securities (ABS) and other capital market products, as well as private credit. OMG contributes to deepening Turkey's credit markets by offering tailored and structured financing solutions to businesses.

Team-Component.home-team-description: OMG Capital Advisors' founders and senior management team have extensive experience in structured finance, investment banking, Turkish capital markets, and regulatory frameworks. The team is composed of highly experienced investment banking professionals with diverse backgrounds in finance, economics, and strategic consulting.

Team-Page.base-description-one: The OMG Capital Team is composed of highly experienced investment banking professionals with a diverse background in finance, economics, and strategic consulting. With over 20 years of combined experience in local and international markets, the team brings a wealth of expertise in corporate finance, mergers and acquisitions, debt restructuring, and capital raising. Each member is dedicated to delivering exceptional value through a client-centric approach, leveraging deep industry knowledge and strategic insight to provide customized financial solutions that support sustainable growth and long-term success for their clients.
Team-Page.base-description-two: Their collaborative and dynamic team environment fosters innovative thinking and meticulous execution, ensuring that clients receive the highest standard of service in every engagement. The OMG Capital Team is committed to building strong, lasting relationships with their clients, guiding them through complex financial transactions and strategic decisions with integrity, professionalism, and a focus on achieving optimal outcomes.

Team-Page.person-description-three: Managing Partner and CEO of OMG Capital Advisors. Previously held senior roles at Deutsche Bank London and Ünlü & Co.
Team-Page.person-description-four: Founding Partner of OMG Capital Advisors. Served as Senior Vice President at the Banking Regulation and Supervision Agency (BDDK) and played an active role in financial restructuring.
Team-Page.person-description-five: Founding Partner of OMG Capital Advisors. Served as Vice President at the Capital Markets Board of Turkey and was involved in the G20 Regulatory Cooperation Committee.
Team-Page.person-description-six: Expert in structured finance, with experience managing portfolios exceeding $300 million.

VDMK-Page.whatIsAbsTitle: What is an Asset Backed Security (ABS)?
VDMK-Page.whatIsAbsText: Asset-Backed Securities (ABS) are a key financing and investment tool in financial markets. They involve securitizing a company's receivables or assets that generate regular cash flows and offering them to investors. ABS provides companies with financing while offering investors diverse return opportunities.
VDMK-Page.howAbsWorksText: 1. Identification of Receivables: A company (the originator) identifies its collectible receivables or assets generating regular cash flows. 2. Securitization: These receivables or assets are transformed into securities in compliance with capital market regulations. 3. Offering to Investors: The securities are sold to investors, providing funds for the company. OMG Capital structures the deal, manages the issuance process, and facilitates investor access. 4. Cash Flow and Returns: Investors receive regular cash flows (interest or principal repayments) from the ABS they purchase.
VDMK-Page.how-to-invest-text: As per capital market regulations, ABS are targeted at qualified investors. If you are a qualified investor, you can invest in ABS managed by OMG Capital by following these steps: 1. Investor Access: Access our platform and log in as an investor. 2. Obtain Information: Learn about current and upcoming ABS transactions through our platform. 3. Invest: Use your investment account with a licensed investment firm to purchase your preferred ABS.

list.investors: Investors purchase ABS, which are issued as VDMK (Varlığa Dayalı Menkul Kıymet) securities. They pay the issuance price for these securities.
list.fund: This fund acts as the intermediary in the ABS structure. It buys the underlying assets from the Kaynak Kuruluş (Originator), which is the entity selling the assets, and issues the ABS to investors.
list.originator: The originator sells the assets (such as loans or receivables) to the Asset Financing Fund. In return, it receives the value of the transferred assets from the fund.
list.debtor: The debtor is the party responsible for making payments on the underlying assets (loans or receivables). The cash flows generated by these payments are transferred to the Asset Financing Fund.
list.payment: Over time, the fund uses the cash flows from the underlying assets to pay back the investors, including both principal and interest on their ABS investment.

VDMK-Page.sourceInstitutionText: The party selling the receivables or assets to the fund.
VDMK-Page.assetFundText: The entity that holds the receivables or assets backing the securities.
VDMK-Page.borrowerText: The party that owes the debt or loan repayment.
VDMK-Page.originatorText: The institution or party that initiates the loan and sells it to the fund.
VDMK-Page.how-to-buy-text: The procedure to invest in ABS starts with qualified investors accessing our platform and obtaining information about transactions. Investors can purchase their preferred ABS using their investment accounts with licensed investment firms.
VDMK-Page.risk-warning-text: ABS offer investors the opportunity to build a diversified portfolio and access various return opportunities. However, understanding the risks associated with such investments and seeking expert advice is crucial.
